Generated Narrative: SearchParameter location-address-state

LocationStateSearchParameter

Parameter address-state:string

Searches based on the address-state field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?address-state={state}

ResourceLocation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesLocation
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: LocationStateSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the address-state field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?address-state={state}
